name: Before the Bears Get Us
description:
Submission For the 2020 Sim Jam

(Full Screen Before Playing)

😴😴😴
🤫Villagers that are bobbing their heads napping🤫
😴😴😴

A colony survival simulation. Keep an eye on the weather and the bears as you try to keep your tiny colony alive year after year.

Make it from scratch: https://github.com/RunDotGames/hunt-gather
